name: The Impossible Task
description:
I aimed here to practice programing and depict an aspect of depression that's not often shown disassociation. It was done in a limited time constraint so while the narrative might not currently encompass all that this might entail. It is my hope I showed an aspect that is often a struggle for people dealing with extreme depression.

To play the game with the images I included, please download the zip file labeled The Impossible Task. Then click on the Microsoft Edge HTML.
